update `CBSI` set CBSI02 = #{cbsi02,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSI03 = #{cbsi03,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSI04 = #{cbsi04,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSI05 = #{cbsi05,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSI06 = #{cbsi06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSI07 = #{cbsi07,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSI08 = #{cbsi08,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSI09 = #{cbsi09,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBSI10 = #{cbsi10,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBSI11 = #{cbsi11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSI12 = #{cbsi12,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBSI13 = #{cbsi13,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBSH01 = #{cbsh01,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CBSI01 = #{cbsi01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT d.CALA08,c.CBPB15,c.CBPB12,c.CBPB08,a.CBSI09,a.CBSI10,a.CBSI11 FROM CBSI a LEFT JOIN CBSH b ON a.CBSH01=b.CBSH01 LEFT JOIN CBPB c ON a.CBSI08=c.CBPB01 LEFT JOIN CALA d ON d.CALA01=c.CBPB10 where b.CBSH10 = #{cbsh10,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT a.CBSH07,a.CBSH08,b.CBWA09,a.CBSH09 FROM CBSH a LEFT JOIN CBWA b ON a.CBSH10=b.CBWA01 where a.CBSH06=0

SELECT a.CBSH07,a.CBSH08,b.CBWA09,a.CBSH09 FROM CBSH a LEFT JOIN CBWA b ON a.CBSH10=b.CBWA01 where a.CBSH06=0 and a.CBSH07 like concat('%', #{cbsh07}, '%') and a.cbsh08 >= #{startTime} and a.cbsh08 <=#{endTime}
